summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) could improve human life and economic competitiveness—but it also poses new risks. The Comptroller General convened the Forum on AI to consider the policy and research implications of AI’s use in 4 areas with the potential to significantly affect daily life—cybersecurity, automated vehicles, criminal justice, and financial services. The forum highlighted the fact that AI will have far-reaching effects on society—even if...
title: Technology Assessment: Artificial Intelligence: Emerging Opportunities, Challenges, and Implications
